items.badge_verified_message:
You're all set to game at our third annual convention!

For questions regarding our policies, including COVID, Refund, and Code of Conduct policies, visit our [Policies page](https://www.final3con.com/policies/).

For upcoming convention information make sure to visit our [website](http://www.final3con.com), follow us on [social media](https://linktr.ee/final3con), and [join our Discord](https://discord.gg/6sNXDb7Wcn).
